changeSet.sql:
WITH tp AS (SELECT e.id, e.template_participation_id FROM exercise e WHERE e.discriminator = 'P' AND e.template_participation_id IS NOT NULL) , sp AS (SELECT e.id, e.solution_participation_id FROM exercise e WHERE e.discriminator = 'P' AND e.solution_participation_id IS NOT NULL)
, fe AS (SELECT f.id, f.text, e.id AS exercise_id FROM Feedback f LEFT JOIN result r ON f.result_id = r.id LEFT JOIN participation p ON r.participation_id = p.id , exercise e WHERE f.type = 3 # AUTOMATIC AND f.text IS NOT NULL AND f.reference IS NULL # no SCA AND f.text NOT LIKE 'SubPolFeedbackIdentifier%' # no submission policy AND (p.exercise_id = e.id OR p.id = (SELECT tp.template_participation_id FROM tp WHERE tp.id = e.id) OR p.id = (SELECT sp.solution_participation_id FROM sp WHERE sp.id = e.id)))
UPDATE feedback f SET test_case_id = ( SELECT tc.id FROM programming_exercise_test_case tc LEFT JOIN fe ON fe.id = f.id WHERE tc.test_name = fe.text AND tc.exercise_id = fe.exercise_id )
UPDATE feedback SET text = NULL WHERE test_case_id IS NOT NULL
